config.introduction: Тук е възможно да конфигурирате Вашите компоненти и Home Assistant. Не всичко е възможно да се конфигурира от Интерфейса, но работим по върпоса.

areas.caption: Регистър на областите
areas.description: Преглед на всички области във Вашия дом.

picker.introduction: Областите се използват за организиране на местоположението на устройствата. Тази информация ще се използва в Home Assistant, за да ви помогне при организирането на Вашия интерфейс, права за достъп и интеграции с други системи.
picker.introduction2: За да поставите устройства в дадена област, използвайте връзката по-долу, за да отидете на страницата за интеграции, след което кликнете върху конфигурирана интеграция, за да видите картите на устройството.
picker.no_areas: Изглежда, че все още нямате области!

delete.confirmation_title: Сигурни ли сте, че искате да изтриете тази област?
delete.confirmation_text: All devices in this area will become unassigned.

detail.usage: A tag can trigger an automation when scanned, you can use NFC tags, QR codes or any other kind of tag. Use our {companion_link} to write this tag to a programmable NFC tag or create a QR code below.

core.introduction: Промяната на конфигурацията може да бъде труден процес. Знаем това. Този раздел ще се опита да направи живота Ви малко по-лесен.

resources.cant_edit_yaml: Използвате Lovelace в YAML режим, следователно не можете да управлявате ресурсите си чрез потребителския интерфейс. Управлявайте ги в configuration.yaml.

detail.warning_text: Adding resources can be dangerous, make sure you know the source of the resource and trust them. Bad resources could seriously harm your system.

server_control.caption: Управление на сървъра
server_control.description: Рестартиране и спиране на Home Assistant сървъра

validation.heading: Проверка на конфигурацията
validation.introduction: Проверете конфигурацията, ако скоро сте направили промени и искате да се уверите, че всичко работи

reloading.heading: Презареждане на YAML конфигурацията
reloading.introduction: Някои части от Home Assistant могат да се презаредят без да е необходимо рестартиране. Натискането на Презареди ще отхвърли настоящата конфигурация и ще зареди новата конфигурация.
reloading.rest: Reload rest entities and notify services
reloading.rpi_gpio: Презареди GPIO обектите на Raspberry Pi

server_management.heading: Управление на сървъра
server_management.introduction: Управляване на Home Assistant сървъра... от Home Assistant.
server_management.confirm_restart: Сигурни ли сте, че искате да рестартирате Home Assistant?
server_management.confirm_stop: Сигурни ли сте, че искате да спрете Home Assistant?

customize.caption: Персонализиране

picker.introduction: Настройте атрибутите за всеки обект. Добавени/редактирани персонализации ще имат ефект, когато обектът бъде опреснен.

warning.include_sentence: It seems that your configuration.yaml doesn't properly
warning.not_applied: Changes made here are written in it, but will not be applied after a configuration reload unless the include is in place.

customize.attributes_customize: The following attributes are already set in customize.yaml
customize.attributes_outside: The following attributes are customized from outside of customize.yaml
customize.different_include: Possibly via a domain, a glob or a different include.
customize.attributes_set: The following attributes of the entity are set programmatically.
customize.attributes_override: You can override them if you like.
customize.attributes_not_set: The following attributes weren't set. Set them if you like.

picker.introduction: Редакторът на автоматизации позволява да създавате и редактирате автоматизации. Моля, последвайте препратката по-долу за да прочетете инструкциите за да се уверите, че Home Assistant е правилно конфигуриран.
picker.no_automations: Не можахме да намерим никакви автоматизации подлежащи на редакция
picker.only_editable: Only automations defined in automations.yaml are editable.
picker.delete_confirm: Are you sure you want to delete this automation?

editor.introduction: Използвайте автоматизации, за да съживите дома си
editor.load_error_not_editable: Само автоматизации от automations.yaml могат да се редактират.
editor.unsaved_confirm: Имате незапазени промени. Сигурни ли сте, че искате да напуснете?

modes.label: Mode
modes.description: The mode controls what happens when the automation is triggered while the actions are still running from a previous trigger. Check the {documentation_link} for more info.

triggers.name: Trigger
triggers.introduction: Тригерите са това, което стартира обработката на правило за автоматизация. Възможно е да се зададат множество тригери за едно и също правило. След като тригера стартира, Home Assistant ще провери условията, ако има такива, и ще стартира действието.
triggers.delete_confirm: Сигурни ли сте, че искате да изтриете?

conditions.name: Condition
conditions.introduction: Условията са незадължителна част от правилото за автоматизация и могат да се използват, за да се предотврати настъпването на действие, когато се задейства тригера. Условията изглеждат много близки до тригерите, но са много различни. Тригерът ще разглежда събитията, случващи се в системата, докато условието разглежда само как системата изглежда в момента. Тригера може да наблюдава включването на ключ. Условието може само да види дали ключ е включен или изключен в момента.
conditions.delete_confirm: Сигурни ли сте, че искате да изтриете?

actions.name: Action
actions.introduction: Действията са това, което Home Assistant ще направи, когато се активира автоматизацията.
actions.delete_confirm: Сигурни ли сте, че искате да изтриете?

task_selection.introduction: Type below what this automation should do, and we will try to convert it into a Home Assistant automation.
task_selection.language_note: Note: Only English is supported for now.
task_selection.error_empty: Enter a command or tap skip.
task_selection.error_unsupported: We couldn't create an automation for that (yet?).

link_devices.header: Great! Now we need to link some devices
link_devices.ambiguous_entities: One or more devices have more than one matching entity, please pick the one you want to use.

picker.introduction: The script editor allows you to create and edit scripts. Please follow the link below to read the instructions to make sure that you have configured Home Assistant correctly.
picker.no_scripts: We couldn’t find any editable scripts

editor.id_already_exists_save_error: You can't save this script because the ID is not unique, pick another ID or leave it blank to automatically generate one.
editor.introduction: Use scripts to execute a sequence of actions.

modes.label: Mode
modes.description: The mode controls what happens when script is invoked while it is still running from one or more previous invocations. Check the {documentation_link} for more info.

editor.load_error_not_editable: Only scripts inside scripts.yaml are editable.
editor.delete_confirm: Are you sure you want to delete this script?
editor.sequence_sentence: The sequence of actions of this script.

picker.introduction: The scene editor allows you to create and edit scenes. Please follow the link below to read the instructions to make sure that you have configured Home Assistant correctly.

picker.only_editable: Only scenes defined in scenes.yaml are editable.
picker.delete_confirm: Сигурни ли сте, че искате да изтриете тази сцена?

editor.introduction: Use scenes to bring your home alive.
editor.load_error_not_editable: Only scenes in scenes.yaml are editable.
editor.unsaved_confirm: Имате незапазени промени. Сигурни ли сте, че искате да напуснете?
editor.name: Name

devices.introduction: Add the devices that you want to be included in your scene. Set all the devices to the state you want for this scene.

entities.introduction: Entities that do not belong to a device can be set here.
entities.device_entities: If you add an entity that belongs to a device, the device will be added.

cloud.description_features: Контролирайте дома си, и когато не сте вкъщи, активирайте интегрирациите с Alexa и Google Assistant.

login.title: Cloud Login
login.introduction: Home Assistant Cloud provides you with a secure remote connection to your instance while away from home. It also allows you to connect with cloud-only services: Amazon Alexa and Google Assistant.
login.introduction2: This service is run by our partner
login.introduction2a: , a company founded by the founders of Home Assistant and Hass.io.
login.introduction3: Home Assistant Cloud is a subscription service with a free one month trial. No payment information necessary.
login.learn_more_link: Научете повече за Home Assistant Cloud
login.alert_password_change_required: You need to change your password before logging in.
login.alert_email_confirm_necessary: You need to confirm your email before logging in.

forgot_password.title: Forgot password
forgot_password.subtitle: Forgot your password
forgot_password.instructions: Enter your email address and we will send you a link to reset your password.
forgot_password.check_your_email: Check your email for instructions on how to reset your password.

register.title: Register Account
register.headline: Start your free trial
register.information: Create an account to start your free one month trial with Home Assistant Cloud. No payment information necessary.
register.information2: The trial will give you access to all the benefits of Home Assistant Cloud, including:
register.feature_remote_control: Control of Home Assistant away from home
register.feature_webhook_apps: Easy integration with webhook-based apps like OwnTracks
register.information3: This service is run by our partner
register.information3a: , a company founded by the founders of Home Assistant and Hass.io.
register.information4: By registering an account you agree to the following terms and conditions.
register.account_created: Account created! Check your email for instructions on how to activate your account.

account.thank_you_note: Thank you for being part of Home Assistant Cloud. It's because of people like you that we are able to make a great home automation experience for everyone. Thank you!
account.integrations_introduction: Integrations for Home Assistant Cloud allow you to connect with services in the cloud without having to expose your Home Assistant instance publicly on the internet.

remote.title: Remote Control
remote.access_is_being_prepared: Remote access is being prepared. We will notify you when it's ready.
remote.info: Home Assistant Cloud provides a secure remote connection to your instance while away from home.
remote.instance_will_be_available: Your instance will be available at

alexa.title: Alexa
alexa.info: With the Alexa integration for Home Assistant Cloud you'll be able to control all your Home Assistant devices via any Alexa-enabled device.
alexa.enable_ha_skill: Enable the Home Assistant skill for Alexa
alexa.info_state_reporting: If you enable state reporting, Home Assistant will send all state changes of exposed entities to Amazon. This allows you to always see the latest states in the Alexa app and use the state changes to create routines.

google.title: Google Assistant
google.info: With the Google Assistant integration for Home Assistant Cloud you'll be able to control all your Home Assistant devices via any Google Assistant-enabled device.
google.enable_ha_skill: Activate the Home Assistant skill for Google Assistant
google.info_state_reporting: If you enable state reporting, Home Assistant will send all state changes of exposed entities to Google. This allows you to always see the latest states in the Google app.
google.enter_pin_info: Please enter a pin to interact with security devices. Security devices are doors, garage doors and locks. You will be asked to say/enter this pin when interacting with such devices via Google Assistant.
google.devices_pin: ПИН код за Устройства за защита
google.enter_pin_hint: Въведете ПИН за използване на устройства за защита
google.sync_entities_404_message: Failed to sync your entities to Google, ask Google 'Hey Google, sync my devices' to sync your entities.

webhooks.title: Webhooks
webhooks.info: Anything that is configured to be triggered by a webhook can be given a publicly accessible URL to allow you to send data back to Home Assistant from anywhere, without exposing your instance to the internet.
webhooks.no_hooks_yet: Looks like you have no webhooks yet. Get started by configuring a
webhooks.link_learn_more: Learn more about creating webhook-powered automations.

alexa.title: Alexa
alexa.banner: Editing which entities are exposed via this UI is disabled because you have configured entity filters in configuration.yaml.

google.title: Google Assistant
google.banner: Editing which entities are exposed via this UI is disabled because you have configured entity filters in configuration.yaml.

dialog_cloudhook.available_at: The webhook is available at the following URL:
dialog_cloudhook.managed_by_integration: This webhook is managed by an integration and cannot be disabled.
dialog_cloudhook.info_disable_webhook: If you no longer want to use this webhook, you can
dialog_cloudhook.confirm_disable: Are you sure you want to disable this webhook?

cloud.caption: Home Assistant Cloud

devices.add_prompt: No {name} have been added using this device yet. You can add one by clicking the + button above.
devices.caption: Устройства
devices.name: Name

automation.no_device_automations: There are no automations available for this device.

devices.cant_edit: You can only edit items that are created in the UI.
devices.confirm_rename_entity_ids: Do you also want to rename the entity IDs of your entities?
devices.confirm_rename_entity_ids_warning: This will not change any configuration (like automations, scripts, scenes, dashboards) that is currently using these entities! You will have to update them yourself to use the new entity IDs!
devices.confirm_delete: Сигурни ли сте, че искате да изтриете устройството?

picker.introduction: Home Assistant поддържа регистър на всички обекти, които някога е виждал, които могат да бъдат идентифицирани уникално. Всеки от тези обекти ще има  идентификатор на обект, който ще бъде резервиран само за този обект.
picker.introduction2: Използвайте регистъра на обектите, за да промените името, идентификатора на обекта или да премахнете записа от Home Assistant. Моля имайте на предвид, че премахването на записа от регистъра на обектите няма да премахне обекта. За да направите това, следвайте препратката по-долу и я премахнете от страницата за интеграции.

enable_selected.confirm_text: This will make them available in Home Assistant again if they are now disabled.

disable_selected.confirm_text: Disabled entities will not be added to Home Assistant.

remove_selected.confirm_text: You should remove them from your Lovelace config and automations if they contain these entities.
remove_selected.confirm_partly_text: You can only remove {removable} of the selected {selected} entities. Entities can only be removed when the integration is no longer providing the entities. Sometimes you have to restart Home Assistant before you can remove the entities of a removed integration. Are you sure you want to remove the removable entities?

person.caption: Хора
person.description: Управлявайте хората, които следите от Home Assistant.
person.introduction: Here you can define each person of interest in Home Assistant.
person.note_about_persons_configured_in_yaml: Note: people configured via configuration.yaml cannot be edited via the UI.
person.no_persons_created_yet: Looks like you have not created any people yet.
person.confirm_delete: Are you sure you want to delete this person?
person.confirm_delete2: All devices belonging to this person will become unassigned.
person.person_not_found: We couldn't find the person you were trying to edit.

detail.name: Име
detail.device_tracker_intro: Изберете устройствата, които принадлежат на това лице.
detail.no_device_tracker_available_intro: When you have devices that indicate the presence of a person, you will be able to assign them to a person here. You can add your first device by adding a presence-detection integration from the integrations page.
detail.confirm_delete_user: Сигурен ли сте, че искате да изтриете потребителски акаунт {name}? Все още ще можете да проследявате човека, но той, повече няма да може да се вписва.
detail.allow_login: Разрешаване на потребител да се впише

zone.caption: Zones
zone.description: Manage the zones you want to track people in
zone.introduction: Zones allow you to specify certain regions on earth. When a person is within a zone, the state will take the name from the zone. Zones can also be used as a trigger or condition inside automation setups.
zone.no_zones_created_yet: Looks like you have not created any zones yet.
zone.confirm_delete: Are you sure you want to delete this zone?
zone.configured_in_yaml: Zones configured via configuration.yaml cannot be edited via the UI.
zone.edit_home_zone: Радиусът на зоната "Дом" все още не може да бъде редактиран. Плъзнете маркера на картата, за да преместите въпросната зона.
zone.edit_home_zone_narrow: The radius of the Home zone can't be edited from the frontend yet. The location can be changed from the general configuration.
zone.home_zone_core_config: The location of your home zone is editable from the general configuration page. The radius of the Home zone can't be edited from the frontend yet. Do you want to go to the general configuration?

detail.name: Name
detail.icon_error_msg: Icon should be in the format ''prefix:iconname'', for example: ''mdi:home''
detail.passive_note: Passive zones are hidden in the frontend and are not used as location for device trackers. This is useful if you just want to use it for automations.

integrations.caption: Интеграции
integrations.no_integrations: Изглежда, че все още нямате конфигурирани интеграции. Кликнете върху бутона по-долу, за да добавите първата си интеграция!
integrations.note_about_integrations: Not all integrations can be configured via the UI yet.
integrations.none: Нищо не е конфигурирано към момента
integrations.rename_dialog: Редактирайте името на този запис в конфигурацията

ignore.confirm_ignore: Are you sure you don't want to set up this integration? You can undo this by clicking the 'Show ignored integrations' in the overflow menu on the top right.
ignore.confirm_delete_ignore: This will make the integration appear in your discovered integrations again when it gets discovered. This might require a restart or take some time.

config_entry.delete_confirm: Сигурни ли сте, че искате да изтриете интеграцията?
config_entry.restart_confirm: Рестартирайте Home Assistant за да завършите премахването на интеграцията
config_entry.reload_restart_confirm: Restart Home Assistant to finish reloading this integration

config_flow.not_all_required_fields: Not all required fields are filled in.

external_step.description: Завършването на тази стъпка изисква да посетите външен уебсайт.

config_flow.loading_first_time: Please wait while the integration is being installed

users.caption: Потребители
users.users_privileges_note: The user group feature is a work in progress. The user will be unable to administer the instance via the UI. We're still auditing all management API endpoints to ensure that they correctly limit access to administrators.

editor.caption: Преглед на потребителя
editor.name: Име
editor.system_generated_users_not_removable: Unable to remove system generated users.
editor.system_generated_users_not_editable: Неуспешно обновяване на системно генерираните потребители
editor.confirm_user_deletion: Are you sure you want to delete {name}?

node_query_stages.protocolinfo: Obtaining basic Z-Wave capabilities of this node from the controller
node_query_stages.probe: Checking if the node is awake/alive
node_query_stages.wakeup: Setting up support for wakeup queues and messages
node_query_stages.manufacturerspecific1: Obtaining manufacturer and product ID codes from the node
node_query_stages.nodeinfo: Obtaining supported command classes from the node
node_query_stages.nodeplusinfo: Obtaining Z-Wave+ information from the node
node_query_stages.manufacturerspecific2: Obtaining additional manufacturer and product ID codes from the node
node_query_stages.versions: Obtaining information about firmware and command class versions
node_query_stages.instances: Obtaining details about what instances or channels a device supports
node_query_stages.static: Obtaining static values from the device
node_query_stages.cacheload: Loading information from the OpenZWave cache file. Battery nodes will stay at this stage until the node wakes up.
node_query_stages.neighbors: Obtaining a list of the node's neighbors
node_query_stages.session: Obtaining infrequently changing values from the node
node_query_stages.dynamic: Obtaining frequently changing values from the node
node_query_stages.configuration: Obtaining configuration values from the node

refresh_node.title: Refresh Node Information
refresh_node.description: This will tell OpenZWave to re-interview a node and update the node's command classes, capabilities, and values.
refresh_node.battery_note: If the node is battery powered, be sure to wake it before proceeding
refresh_node.wakeup_instructions_source: Wakeup instructions are sourced from the OpenZWave community device database.

details.driverallnodesqueriedsomedead: All nodes have been queried. Some nodes were found dead
details.driverawakenodesqueries: All awake nodes have been queried
details.driverfailed: Failed to connect to Z-Wave controller

select_instance.introduction: You have more than one OpenZWave instance running. Which instance would you like to manage?
select_instance.none_found: Не можахме да намерим OpenZWave инстанция. Ако смятате че не е вярно, проверете Вашите OpenZWare и MQTT и се уверете че, Home Assistant може да комуникира със MQTT брокера

node_config.introduction: Manage the different configuration parameters for a Z-Wave node.
node_config.help_source: Config parameter descriptions and help text are provided by the OpenZWave project.
node_config.wakeup_help: Battery powered nodes must be awake to change their configuration. If the node is not awake, OpenZWave will attempt to update the node's configuration the next time it wakes up, which could be multiple hours (or days) later. Follow these steps to wake up your device:

zha.introduction: Here it is possible to configure the ZHA component. Not everything is possible to configure from the UI yet, but we're working on it.
zha.description: Управление на Zigbee мрежата за домашна автоматизация

add_device_page.pairing_mode: Make sure your devices are in pairing mode. Check the instructions of your device on how to do this.
add_device_page.discovered_text: Devices will show up here once discovered.
add_device_page.no_devices_found: No devices were found, make sure they are in paring mode and keep them awake while discovering is running.
add_device_page.discovery_text: Откритите устройства ще се покажат тук. Следвайте инструкциите за вашето устройство(а) и поставете устройствата в режим на сдвояване.
add_device_page.header: Zigbee Home Automation - Добавяне на устройства

network_management.introduction: Commands that affect the entire network

add.caption: Add Devices
add.description: Add devices to the Zigbee network

node_management.introduction: Run ZHA commands that affect a single device. Pick a device to see a list of available commands.
node_management.hint_battery_devices: Note: Sleepy (battery powered) devices need to be awake when executing commands against them. You can generally wake a sleepy device by triggering it.
node_management.hint_wakeup: Някои устройства като сензорите Xiaomi имат бутон за събуждане, който можете да натискате на интервали от ~ 5 секунди, които поддържат устройствата будни, докато взаимодействате с тях.
node_management.help_node_dropdown: Select a device to view per-device options.

clusters.help_cluster_dropdown: Select a cluster to view attributes and commands.
clusters.introduction: Clusters are the building blocks for Zigbee functionality. They separate functionality into logical units. There are client and server types and that are comprised of attributes and commands.

cluster_attributes.help_attribute_dropdown: Select an attribute to view or set its value.
cluster_attributes.help_get_zigbee_attribute: Get the value for the selected attribute.
cluster_attributes.help_set_zigbee_attribute: Set attribute value for the specified cluster on the specified entity.

cluster_commands.help_command_dropdown: Select a command to interact with.

groups.caption: Groups
groups.group_details: Here are all the details for the selected Zigbee group.
groups.create_group_details: Enter the required details to create a new zigbee group

group_binding.group_picker_help: Select a group to issue a bind command.
group_binding.cluster_selection_help: Select clusters to bind to the selected group.
group_binding.bind_button_help: Bind the selected group to the selected device clusters.
group_binding.unbind_button_help: Unbind the selected group from the selected device clusters.

zha.caption: ZHA

network_management.introduction: Изпълнение на команди, които засягат Z-Wave мрежата. Няма да получите обратна информация за това дали повечето команди са успели, но можете да проверите OZW лог файла, за да се опитате да разберете.

node_management.introduction: Run Z-Wave commands that affect a single node. Pick a node to see a list of available commands.
node_management.nodes_hint: Select node to view per-node options
node_management.exclude_entity: Exclude this entity from Home Assistant

ozw_log.introduction: View the log. 0 is the minimum (loads entire log) and 1000 is the maximum. Load will show a static log and tail will auto update with the last specified number of lines of the log.

network_status.network_starting_note: Това може да отнеме известно време в зависимост от размера на мрежата Ви.
network_status.network_started_note_some_queried: Будните устройства бяха разпитани. Спящите устройства ще бъдат разпитани, когато са на линия.

cards.confirm_delete: Are you sure you want to delete this card?

empty_state.title: Добре дошли у дома
empty_state.no_devices: Тази страница ви позволява да контролирате устройствата си, но изглежда, че все още нямате настроени устройства. Отидете на страницата за интеграции, за да започнете.

safe-mode.description: Home Assistant ran into trouble while loading your configuration and is now running in safe mode. Take a look at the error log to see what went wrong.

starting.description: Home Assistant is starting, please wait...

unused_entities.title: Unused entities
unused_entities.available_entities: These are the entities that you have available, but are not in your Lovelace UI yet.
unused_entities.select_to_add: Select the entities you want to add to a card and then click the add card button.

add_entities.yaml_unsupported: You cannot use this function when using Lovelace UI in YAML mode.
add_entities.generated_unsupported: You can only use this function when you have taken control of the Lovelace UI.

views.confirm_delete_text: Are you sure you want to delete your ''{name}'' view?
views.confirm_delete_existing_cards: Deleting this view will also remove the cards
views.confirm_delete_existing_cards_text: Are you sure you want to delete your ''{name}'' view? The view contains {number} cards that will be deleted. This action cannot be undone.

reload_resources.refresh_body: You have to refresh the page to complete the reload. Do you want to refresh now?

raw_editor.confirm_remove_config_title: Are you sure you want to remove your Lovelace UI configuration?
raw_editor.confirm_remove_config_text: We will automatically generate your Lovelace UI views with your areas and devices if you remove your Lovelace UI configuration.
raw_editor.confirm_unsaved_changes: You have unsaved changes, are you sure you want to exit?
raw_editor.confirm_unsaved_comments: Your configuration contains comment(s), these will not be saved. Do you want to continue?
raw_editor.error_remove: Конфигурацията не може да бъде премахната: {error}
raw_editor.resources_moved: Resources should no longer be added to the Lovelace configuration but can be added in the Lovelace config panel.

edit_lovelace.header: Заглавие на вашия Lovelace потребителски интерфейс
edit_lovelace.explanation: Това заглавие се показва над всичките ви изгледи в Lovelace
edit_lovelace.title: Title

visibility.select_users: Изберете кои потребители да виждат този изглед в навигацията

edit_badges.panel_mode: These badges will not be displayed because this view is in "Panel Mode".

edit_card.pick_card: Изберете картата, която искате да добавите.
edit_card.pick_card_view_title: Which card would you like to add to your {name} view?
edit_card.confirm_cancel: Сигурни ли сте, че искате да отмените?

move_card.header: Choose a view to move the card to

suggest_card.header: We created a suggestion for you

save_config.header: Поемете контрол над потребителския интерфейс на Lovelace
save_config.para: По подразбиране Home Assistant поддържа потребителския интерфейс, като го актуализира, когато нови обекти или компоненти на Lovelace станат достъпни. Ако поемете контрол, ние вече няма да правим автоматично промени вместо вас.
save_config.para_sure: Наистина ли искате да поемете управлението на потребителския интерфейс?
save_config.yaml_mode: Използвате YAML режим за това табло, което означава, че не можете да промените вашата Lovelace конфигурация от потребителския интерфейс. Ако искате да управлявате това табло от потребителския интерфейс, премахнете „mode: yaml“ от вашата Lovelace конфигурация в „configuration.yaml.“.
save_config.yaml_control: To take control in YAML mode, create a YAML file with the name you specified in your config for this dashboard, or the default 'ui-lovelace.yaml'.
save_config.yaml_config: To help you start here is the current config of this dashboard:

migrate.para_no_id: Този елемент няма идентификатор. Моля, добавете идентификатор към този елемент в "ui-lovelace.yaml".
migrate.para_migrate: Home Assistant може автоматично да добави идентификатори към всичките ви карти и изгледи, като натиска бутона "Мигриране на конфигурация".

action-editor.editor_service_data: Service data can only be entered in the code editor

alarm-panel.name: Alarm Panel
alarm-panel.description: The Alarm Panel card allows you to Arm and Disarm your alarm control panel integrations.

calendar.name: Calendar
calendar.description: The Calendar card displays a calendar including day, week and list views

conditional.name: Conditional
conditional.description: The Conditional card displays another card based on entity states.
conditional.condition_explanation: The card will be shown when ALL conditions below are fulfilled.

entities.name: Entities
entities.description: The Entities card is the most common type of card. It groups items together into lists.
entities.edit_special_row: View the details of this row by clicking the edit button

entity.name: Entity
entity.description: The Entity card gives you a quick overview of your entity’s state.

button.name: Button
button.description: The Button card allows you to add buttons to perform tasks.
button.default_action_help: The default action depends on the entity's capabilities, it will either be toggled or the more info will be shown.

entity-filter.name: Entity Filter
entity-filter.description: The Entity Filter card allows you to define a list of entities that you want to track only when in a certain state.

gauge.name: Gauge
gauge.description: The Gauge card is a basic card that allows visually seeing sensor data.

glance.name: Glance
glance.description: The Glance card is useful to group multiple sensors in a compact overview.

grid.name: Grid
grid.description: The Grid card allows you to show multiple cards in a grid.

logbook.name: Logbook
logbook.description: The Logbook card shows a list of events for entities.

history-graph.name: History Graph
history-graph.description: The History Graph card allows you to display a graph for each of the entities listed.

horizontal-stack.name: Horizontal Stack
horizontal-stack.description: The Horizontal Stack card allows you to stack together multiple cards, so they always sit next to each other in the space of one column.

humidifier.name: Humidifier
humidifier.description: The Humidifier card gives control of your humidifier entity. Allowing you to change the humidity and mode of the entity.

iframe.name: Уеб страница
iframe.description: The Webpage card allows you to embed your favorite webpage right into Home Assistant.

light.name: Light
light.description: The Light card allows you to change the brightness of the light.

generic.manual_description: Need to add a custom card or just want to manually write the yaml?
generic.name: Name
generic.title: Title
generic.state_color: Да се оцветят ли иконите спрямо състоянието?

map.name: Map
map.description: The Map card that allows you to display entities on a map.

markdown.name: Markdown
markdown.description: The Markdown card is used to render Markdown.

media-control.name: Media Control
media-control.description: The Media Control card is used to display media player entities on an interface with easy to use controls.

picture.name: Picture
picture.description: The Picture card allows you to set an image to use for navigation to various paths in your interface or to call a service.

picture-elements.name: Picture Elements
picture-elements.description: The Picture Elements card is one of the most versatile types of cards. The cards allow you to position icons or text and even services! On an image based on coordinates.

picture-entity.name: Picture Entity
picture-entity.description: The Picture Entity card displays an entity in the form of an image. Instead of images from URL, it can also show the picture of camera entities.

picture-glance.name: Picture Glance
picture-glance.description: The Picture Glance card shows an image and corresponding entity states as an icon. The entities on the right side allow toggle actions, others show the more information dialog.

plant-status.name: Plant Status
plant-status.description: The Plant Status card is for all the lovely botanists out there.

sensor.name: Sensor
sensor.description: The Sensor card gives you a quick overview of your sensors state with an optional graph to visualize change over time.

shopping-list.name: Shopping List
shopping-list.description: The Shopping List card allows you to add, edit, check-off, and clear items from your shopping list.
shopping-list.integration_not_loaded: This card requires the `shopping_list` integration to be set up.

thermostat.name: Thermostat
thermostat.description: The Thermostat card gives control of your climate entity. Allowing you to change the temperature and mode of the entity.

vertical-stack.name: Вертикална колона
vertical-stack.description: The Vertical Stack card allows you to group multiple cards so they always sit in the same column.

weather-forecast.name: Прогноза за времето
weather-forecast.description: The Weather Forecast card displays the weather. Very useful to include on interfaces that people display on the wall.

panel_mode.title: Panel Mode?
panel_mode.description: This renders the first card at full width. Other cards in this view as well as badges will not be rendered.
panel_mode.warning_multiple_cards: Този изглед съдържа повече от една карта, но изгледът на панел може да показва само 1 карта.

warning.starting: Home Assistant is starting, not everything may be available yet

changed_toast.message: Конфигурацията на Lovelace бе актуализирана, искате ли да опресните?

profile.logout_text: Are you sure you want to log out?

force_narrow.description: Това ще скрие страничната лента по подразбиране, подобно на изгледа в мобилната версия.

customize_sidebar.header: Промяна на реда и скриване на елементи от страничната лента
customize_sidebar.description: Може също да се задържи водача на страничната лента, за да се активира режим за редактиране.

vibrate.description: Enable or disable vibration on this device when controlling devices.

enable_shortcuts.description: Enable or disable keyboard shortcuts for performing various actions in the UI.

suspend.description: Should we close the connection to the server after being hidden for 5 minutes?

push_notifications.description: Изпращане на известия до това устройство.

add_device_prompt.title: What should this device be called?

dashboard.description: Pick a default dashboard for this device.

mfa.confirm_disable: Сигурни ли сте, че искате да деактивирате {name}?

refresh_tokens.description: Всеки код за опресняване представлява оторизирана сесия. Кодовете за опресняване се премахват, когато натиснете "Изход". Следните кодове за опресняване са активни във Вашия акаунт.
refresh_tokens.confirm_delete: Сигурни ли сте, че искате да изтриете кода за опресняване за {name}?
refresh_tokens.delete_failed: Възникна грешка при изтриването на кода за опресняване.
refresh_tokens.current_token_tooltip: Не може да се изтрие текущия код за опресняване

long_lived_access_tokens.description: Създайте дългосрочни кодове за достъп за да могат скриптовете Ви да взаимодействат с Home Assistant. Всеки код е валиден за 10 години от създаването си. Следните дългосрочни кодове са активни в момента.
long_lived_access_tokens.learn_auth_requests: Научете се как да правите оторизирани заявки.
long_lived_access_tokens.confirm_delete: Сигурни ли сте, че искате да изтриете кода за достъп за {name}?
long_lived_access_tokens.delete_failed: Възникна грешка при изтриването на кода за достъп.
long_lived_access_tokens.create_failed: Възникна грешка при създаването на код за достъп.
long_lived_access_tokens.name: Име
long_lived_access_tokens.prompt_copy_token: Копирайте кода си за достъп. Той няма да бъде показан отново.
long_lived_access_tokens.empty_state: Все още нямате дългосрочни кодове за достъп.

page-authorize.authorizing_client: На път сте да дадете {clientId} достъп до вашия Home Assistant.

init.description: Моля, изберете потребител, като който искате да влезете:

abort.not_whitelisted: Вашият компютър не е в списъка с разрешени компютри.

demo.introduction: Добре дошъл у дома! Достигнахте демонстрацията на Home Assistant, където ще покажем най-добрите потребителски интерфейси, създадени от нашата общност.

events.title: Събития
events.description: Fire an event on the event bus.
events.alert_event_type: Event type is a mandatory field

services.title: Услуги
services.description: The service dev tool allows you to call any available service in Home Assistant.
services.select_service: Select a service to see the description

states.title: Състояния
states.description1: Set the representation of a device within Home Assistant.
states.description2: This will not communicate with the actual device.

templates.title: Шаблон
templates.description: Templates are rendered using the Jinja2 template engine with some Home Assistant specific extensions.
templates.time: This template updates at the start of each minute.
templates.all_listeners: Този шаблон следи за всички събития на промяна на състояние.
templates.no_listeners: Този шаблон не следи за събития на промяна на състояние и не се актуализира автоматично.
templates.listeners: Този шаблон следи за събития със следните промени на състояния:

page-onboarding.intro: Готови ли сте да събудите дома си, да отвоювате независимостта си и да се присъедините към световна общност от хора автоматизиращи домовете си?

user.intro: Нека да започнете, като създадете потребителски акаунт.

core-config.intro: Здравейте {name} , добре дошли в Home Assistant. Как бихте искали да назовете дома си?
core-config.intro_location: Бихме искали да знаем къде живеете. Тази информация ще помогне за показването на информация и създаването на автоматизаци, които се активират от изгрев и залез. Тези данни никога не се споделят извън мрежата ви.
core-config.intro_location_detect: Можем да ви помогнем да попълните тази информация, като изпратим еднократна заявка до външна услуга.
core-config.location_name: Name of your Home Assistant installation

integration.intro: Устройствата и услугите са представени в Home Assistant като Интеграции. Можете да ги настроите сега или да го направите по-късно от конфигурационния екран.

restore.description: Alternatively you can restore from a previous snapshot.

external_panel.question_trust: Do you trust the external panel {name} at {link}?
external_panel.complete_access: It will have access to all data in Home Assistant.
external_panel.hide_message: Check docs for the panel_custom component to hide this message

shopping-list.microphone_tip: Докоснете микрофона горе вдясно и кажете "Add candy to my shopping list"
